alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 10:09AM CST until March 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .Recent rainfall in the Big Muddy basin has caused rises in the river. At Murphysboro, the river is forecast to crest slightly above flood stage late Sunday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest at flood stage Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
